        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Name to call the player in the UI
        displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI
        priority - How early in the turn the player can act
        hitPoints - Player's starting number of hitpoints

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        Play a turn. Doing this means displaying a menu to the user and getting their selected option. Ignores more than 26 options. We could do better. We could also roll out a dedicated menu class instead of having it here. Player is 90% menu.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - the actions to display
        map - the map to display
        display - the object that performs the console I/O
        Returns:
        the Action that the user selects

      • showMenu

        protected Action showMenu(Actions actions,
                          Display display)
        Display a menu to the user and have them select an option.
        Parameters:
        actions - the Actions that the user can choose from
        display - the I/O object that will display the map
        Returns:
        the Action selected by the user
